phases.title: Water Comfort & Safety
phases.description: Essential water safety and comfort skills required for all swimming strokes

exit_criteria.description: Enter pool safely using ladder or steps without assistance
Stand comfortably in chest-deep water without holding pool wall
Submerge face completely underwater for 5 seconds without panic

phases.title: Basic Floating & Breathing
phases.description: Fundamental floating and breathing skills that form the foundation for all strokes

exit_criteria.description: Float on back for 15 seconds without support or excessive movement
Float horizontally face-down for 10 seconds with face in water
Demonstrate rhythmic breathing: exhale underwater, lift head to inhale

phases.title: Breaststroke Kick Foundations
phases.description: Master basic breaststroke kick mechanics with proper body position

exit_criteria.description: Demonstrate proper breaststroke kick foot position at pool wall
Complete 10 yards of kick with kickboard maintaining horizontal body position
Show clear recovery-catch-power-glide sequence in kick cycle

phases.title: Kick Development & Power
phases.description: Develop kick power and endurance while maintaining technique

exit_criteria.description: Generate visible forward propulsion with each kick stroke
Complete 25 yards of continuous kicking with kickboard
Maintain proper glide phase (legs together) for 2+ seconds after each kick

phases.title: Breathing Integration
phases.description: Coordinate breathing with kick cycle timing

exit_criteria.description: Time breathing lift during kick recovery phase consistently
Complete 15 yards of kick-breathing coordination without breaking rhythm
Demonstrate controlled exhale during underwater glide phase

phases.title: Arm Technique Introduction
phases.description: Learn basic breaststroke arm movements and coordination

exit_criteria.description: Demonstrate proper catch position with hands separating to shoulder width
Complete pull-recovery sequence with arms while supported by pull buoy
Coordinate arm movement with breathing lift naturally

phases.title: Stroke Coordination
phases.description: Integrate arms and legs into coordinated breaststroke

exit_criteria.description: Demonstrate overlapping arm and leg recovery (not sequential timing)
Complete 15 yards of recognizable full breaststroke technique
Maintain consistent stroke rhythm and glide phases

phases.title: Distance & Performance
phases.description: Build endurance and achieve 25-yard goal with consistent technique

exit_criteria.description: Complete 25 yards of continuous breaststroke with recognizable technique
Maintain stroke technique quality throughout 25-yard distance
Demonstrate ability to pace effort appropriately for distance swimming
